Question
========
This table shows information about whether one of the assumptions of
linear regression is **not** met. Which assumption is that?  
  
<img src="durbinwatson.png" class="fr-fic fr-dii tvcss_2"
alt="durbinwatson" />

Answerlist
----------
* Independence of errors
* Multicollinearity
* Homoscedasticity
* Normality of residuals

Solution
========





This table shows the Durbin-Watson test, which tests for independence of
errors (autocorrelation).
